Interface CardEffects


  • interface CardEffects
    Class covering all the generic card effects
    Author:
    Al√¨ El Wahsh

    • Method Detail

      • changeValue

        static java.lang.String changeValue(Die d,
                                    boolean invert,
                                    int newValue)
        Changes the value of a single die
        Parameters:
        d - die
        newValue - new die value
        invert - true if it change the value using the one on the opposite face
        Returns:
        null, if the operation is successful, an error string otherwise

      • ignoringInsertionRule

        static java.lang.String ignoringInsertionRule(Player player,
                                              int h,
                                              int w,
                                              Die d,
                                              boolean colorRestriction,
                                              boolean valueRestriction,
                                              boolean adjacentRestriction)
        Adds a die to the grid ignoring a specific rule
        Parameters:
        player - player who's trying to place the die
        h - height of the spot
        w - width of the spot
        d - the die to be placed
        colorRestriction - true if color restriction is enabled
        valueRestriction - true if value restriction is enabled
        adjacentRestriction - true if adjacency restriction is enabled
        Returns:
        null if the requirements are respected, otherwise an error message

      • reserveRoundTrackSwap

        static java.lang.String reserveRoundTrackSwap(int reserveIndex,
                                              int round,
                                              int diePosition,
                                              Reserve reserve,
                                              RoundTracker roundTracker)
        Swaps a die from the reserve with one from the round track
        Parameters:
        reserveIndex - die index inside the reserve
        round - round of the round track
        diePosition - position of the die inside the roundtrack
        reserve - reserve
        roundTracker - round track
        Returns:
        null if it's a success, an error string otherwise

      • reRoll

        static void reRoll(boolean all,
                   Reserve reserve,
                   Die d)
        Rerolls a die/ all dice inside the reserve
        Parameters:
        all - true if all dice are rerolle, false if it is just one
        reserve - reserve to be rerolled
        d - die to be rerolled

      • reserveBagSwap

        static void reserveBagSwap(int reserveIndex,
                           Bag bag,
                           Reserve reserve)
        Swaps a die form the reserve with one from the bag
        Parameters:
        reserveIndex - die position inside the reserve
        bag - bag from which a die is taken
        reserve - reserve
